corePropertyInfo.description: A unique identifier for the property.
The postal code where the property is located.
The street address of the property.
The city in which the property is located.
The state abbreviation where the property is located.

physicalOperationalAttributes.description: The average size (in square feet) of the units at the property.
The number of floors or stories the building has.
Indicates the stability or operational consistency of the property (e.g., stable rent or occupancy).
The classification or quality tier of the property (often designated A, B, C, etc.).
The year in which the property was constructed.
The current operational status of the property (e.g., Stabilized, Under Construction).

locationMedia.description: The geographic latitude coordinate of the property.
The geographic longitude coordinate of the property.
The file path or URL to the primary ('hero') image of the property.
The source or provider of the hero image.
The submarket or localized market area where the property is located.

unitRegionalData.description: The total number of rental units available at the property.
The CBSA code identifying the metropolitan area or region in which the property is located.
An index field for the dataset records as nested under a given cbsa_code.
Indicates the record status in the dataset (e.g., data validation, operational status).

rentPerformanceMetrics.description: The annual percentage change in rent according to market performance data.
The historical asking rent amount based on market performance data.
Historical average asking rent per square foot.
A historical metric reflecting the concentration ratio of rents (distribution across units).
The market performance occupancy rate, representing the proportion of occupied units.
The current rent figure derived from market performance data.
The current rent per square foot metric.

submarketHistoricalPriceBand.description: Historical asking rent data for a specific price band in the submarket.
Historical actual rent data for a specific price band in the submarket.
Historical concentration ratio of rents within a specified price band.
Historical occupancy rate aggregated at the submarket level.
Historical rent per square foot for a specific price band in the submarket.
Historical average asking rent per square foot within a specified price band.
The annual percentage change in rent for a specified price band in the submarket.

simpsonFields.description: Unique identifier for the community property.
The name of the community property.
The primary street address of the community property.
The secondary address line for the community property (if applicable).
The city where the community property is located.
The state abbreviation where the community property is located.
The postal code of the community property.
Unique identifier for the mapped city.
Unique identifier for the secondary search city.
Name of the secondary search city.
The geographic latitude coordinate of the community property.
The geographic longitude coordinate of the community property.
A URL-friendly version of the community property name.
Thumbnail image URL for the state module (if available).
The full name of the state where the property is located.
The state identifier, typically the state abbreviation or code.

ZLSFields.description: The street address of the property.
The city where the property is located.
Indicator whether the property is marked as coming soon.
The geographic latitude coordinate of the property.
The geographic longitude coordinate of the property.
The minimum price for rent at the property.
The contact phone number for the property.
The primary background color used in branding or user interface elements for the property.
The primary foreground color used in branding or user interface elements for the property.
Boolean flag indicating whether to display a call-for-pricing message.
The state abbreviation where the property is located.
The website URL for the property.
The postal code of the property.
